scripts.start:all: concurrently --names "ROOT-UI,SVELTE,ANGULAR,ROOT,RIG-VUE,REACT-SPA,RE-REACT,STATUS-BAR" -c "blue,red,white,yellow,magenta,green,cyan,gray" "pnpm run start:root" "pnpm run start:svelte" "pnpm run start:angular-spa" "pnpm run start:single-spa" "pnpm run start:rig-overview-vue" "pnpm run start:rig-info-react" "pnpm run start:re-react" "pnpm run start:status-bar-svelte" --exit
scripts.test:all: concurrently --names "REACT-ROOT,SVELTE,ANGULAR,ROOT,RIG-VUE,REACT-SPA,RE-REACT,STATUS-BAR" -c "blue,red,white,yellow,magenta,green,cyan,gray" "pnpm run test:root" "pnpm run test:svelte" "pnpm run test:angular-spa" "pnpm run test:single-spa" "pnpm run test:rig-overview-vue" "pnpm run test:rig-info-react" "pnpm run test:re-react" "pnpm run test:status-bar-svelte" --exit
scripts.prepare: cd .. && husky install code/.husky | chmod ug+x code/.husky/*
scripts.backend: concurrently --names "ANGULAR,RIG-VUE,SVELTE,STATUS-BAR,REACT-SPA,RE-REACT" -c "white,magenta,red,gray,green,cyan" "pnpm run backend1" "pnpm run backend2" "pnpm run backend3" "pnpm run backend4"  "pnpm run backend5" "pnpm run backend6"
